title: Python Dictionaries: Key-Value Pairs
description: Dictionaries are a fundamental data structure in Python. They allow you to store key-value pairs and are often used to represent real-world objects or concepts. In this challenge, you will be working with dictionaries and their values.

meta.title: Python Dictionaries | Data Structures
meta.description: Learn how to work with dictionaries, a fundamental data structure in Python, and explore their values in this programming tutorial.
meta.keywords: Python, Dictionaries, Data Structures, Key-Value Pairs, Programming

verify.name: Verify Python 3 Test Values Only

i18n.title: Python字典：键值对
